com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui
Class LoginActivity

java.lang.Object
  AccountAuthenticatorActivity
      com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.LoginActivity

public class LoginActivity
extends AccountAuthenticatorActivity

Login Activity: takes care of authenticating the user. Authorization happens inside a web view. Once we get our authorization code, we swap it for an access and refresh token a create an account through the account manager to store them.

Nested Class Summary
protected  class LoginActivity.FinishAuthTask
          Background task that takes care of finishing the authentication flow

loadLoginPage

protected void loadLoginPage()
Tells the webview to load the authorization page. We also update the window title, so its easier to see which system you're logging in to

onAuthFlowComplete

protected void onAuthFlowComplete(OAuth2.TokenEndpointResponse tr)
Called when the user facing part of the auth flow completed successfully. The last step is to call the identity service to get the username.

onAuthFlowError

protected void onAuthFlowError(java.lang.String error,
                               java.lang.String errorDesc)
Called when the user facing part of the auth flow completed with an error. We show the user an error and end the activity.
